content:
Hi all,
Would any of you be interested in an effort to harmonize some of the profiling efforts between the Nordic countries? I can see at least #denmark, #finnish PHR, and #norway being active in addition to this #Sweden on FHIR. I believe there are many similarities between the markets, and that we should put some emphasis on future interoperability of implementations.
I met a team from both Norway and Sweden at HIMSS this week, where something like this was discussed. @Lars Roland @ e-helse was one of the team

Hi Mikael

That is a good idea. We could discuss both profiling work, and strategy.
As a starting point, we could set up a video call so each country can present their work so far and look for some topics we could focus on first. One "hot" topic in Norway is "all things medication".

From the Norwegian side @Lars Roland @ e-helse / @Lars Roland , @Øyvind Aassve and me will attend from The Norwegian Directorate of eHealth -- Øyvind and I are also representing HL7 Norway.
Excellent, sounds like a great first step. @Espen Stranger Seland would you be able to host the call?
Also, see some additional discussion on https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179222-finnish-PHR/topic/Nordic.20cooperation/near/160005518
Yes, I can do that!
Great! So would the next step be a Doodle poll for all the interested parties to agree on a time?

Hi guys, I think there is a really good idea to start exchanging experiences across the Nordics. From your discussion I think we are waiting for @Espen Stranger Seland to get back with some suggestions of when we can have our first meeting. A thought from my side is to make it something like a reoccuring monthly lunch-meeting or something like that, sand then we can se what it turns into.

Nice, I like the idea of making this a monthly meeting.

With that in mind, I created a Doodle at https://doodle.com/poll/s26s6g63ngcpmr2g. If you're interested in participating, please select the days of week and times of day that would generally suit you. Note that the calendar view of Doodle is much better suited for selection.
Let's roll!

Hi all,
Thanks for the replies to Doodle! Since we now have just one time that suits everyone who has participated so far I suggest we select that time.
It's Wednesday morning, 10-11 in Finland, 9-10 in Denmark, Norway, and Sweden, right?
If we make this a monthly meeting, shall we select each first Wednesday of the month? Starting April 3.
@Espen Stranger Seland would it be OK for you that everyone wanting to participate can send you a private message here in Zulip, and you can then send the invites to the video call?
Yes, just send me on PM or espen.stranger.seland@ehelse.no. The conference call system works with Skype Business, phone and other systems.
so... I could be in a nordic country Jun 6-7. Stokholm would be best, travel wise (I think). We could do a joint nordic meeting those days?
and looking at the way these channels are working... seems like we should create a #nordic channel
Sounds great! Grahame Grieve Jun 6 is a holiday in Sweden, is Jun 5 an option? Otherwise Jun 7 could work for those that don't take a long weekend. Sweden would gladly host something.
Jun 7 then
5 is not an option
so I need to commit to travel details soon - can we confirm this this week?
Grahame Grieve, we are having our first teleconference on wednesday morning this week. Is it ok if we confirm after that meeting?
sure

Grahame Grieve We can confirm that we will host a nordic meeting on fhir-profiling on june 7 in Stockholm. Please confirm your travel arrangements and I will send a save-the-date to the nordic chapters.
confirmed. Arrive Stockholm 21:35 June 6 SN2309 leave June 8 755 SAS 525

Good initiative! I am away 5-7/6, but would love to join this in the following meetings. I have looked into the Swedish profiling a bit, and while doing so checked other countries profiles on simplifier. They all seem to diverge in terms of handling similar requirements. So coordination would be good!
Great initiative. We will join in with two participants from Denmark
(deleted)

@Grahame Grieve
Hi Grahame,
I´m responsible for hosting the meeting on the 7/6 in Stockholm. I will send you an invitation. Are you available the whole day for us or is there any time of the day that suites you better? We have booked between 10-16. I will also include an agenda in the booking so you will have time to look at some of the questions we are planning to raise.
I'm available all day
I will arrive late the evening before and leave the next day early in the morning. Any suggestions for hotel?

If you want to be close to the meeting locality I would suggest this:
https://www.scandichotels.se/hotell/sverige/stockholm/scandic-malmen?cmpid=ppc_BH2d_pocoriginal&s_kwcid=AL!7589!3!288942039763!e!!g!!scandic%20malmen&gclid=Cj0KCQjwrJ7nBRD5ARIsAATMxsu9A3LXQH_RdYhD-O4E27iFAp6-dmjfeuvQABGcBQ3sCujY6SGm6OgaAm8DEALw_wcB

or this:

https://www.scandichotels.se/hotell/sverige/stockholm/scandic-sjofartshotellet?cmpid=ppc_BH2d_pocoriginal&s_kwcid=AL!7589!3!291143612290!e!!g!!sj%C3%B6fartshotellet&gclid=Cj0KCQjwrJ7nBRD5ARIsAATMxsvI7GPaVq76IgkrZ_BtyAfn5sevJdBvqTvioAEymoVDuARTRglHdJwaAiuXEALw_wcB
